titleInfo.title: 11th Annual Country Show Featuring Tammy Wynette

mods.abstract: Three color window card (red and black on yellow) announcing the Eleventh Annual Country Show featuring Tammy Wynette with Freddie Hart and The Heartbeats plus Jeannie C. and Country Caravan at Westminster High School on October 2. Poster features a metal photoplate Tammy Wynette.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
